text: Paul Paavela in 1960. Paul Paavela (13 April 1931 in Suojärvi - 19 May 1980 in Vihti) was a Finnish official and politician from the Social Democratic Party. Pekkala was Minister of Finance from 1975–1976 and 1977–1979. == References == |- Category:1931 births Category:1980 deaths Category:People from Suoyarvsky District Category:Social Democratic Party of Finland politicians Category:Ministers of Finance of Finland Category:Finnish lawyers Category:20th-century lawyers
title: Paul Paavela
